reviewText:
Rhonda (Daja Bonnett) is a newscaster in Atlanta and has on "on air" breakdown over her boyfriend. Her cousin, nurse Kim (Pam Banks) is a serial dater, comes to her rescue. The film concerns their lives and "escapades" but I found it boring and the laughs rather low brow. It is described as a sexy film, but it is mostly all talk and no action.

Guide: F-bomb. No real sex. No nudity.
